src:
鱷魚跳出Polo衫　LACOSTE秀款終於買得到
06 Nov 2019, 07:24 by 李詩文
LACOSTE在第一任女性創意總監 Louise Trotter接任後，一躍而成時裝界裡浪尖上的品牌，從她的第一季2019秋冬開始，變成為熱議的時裝週品牌，LACOSTE法國總部也決定在本季讓少數限定店或是選品店進行販售，而台灣目前只有在ARITACTS買得到。


這次LACOSTE的2019秋冬新款與秀款，在ARITACTS獨賣。（LACOSTE提供）

Louise Trotter 2019秋冬以以溫暖的橘黃色和 LACOSTE Vert 132 綠色為主調，並加入了都巿中性色調與網球場的白色調來點綴，透過幾何、拼接的設計元素，簡約流暢的線條，打造出高級訂製時尚碰撞運動風街頭元素。














2019 年秋冬秀款系列另一個代表性的特色，就是Louise Trotter 將 Robert George 在 1927 年設計的 LACOSTE 鱷魚標識，大膽的重新詮釋與翻轉。她將LACOSTE 標誌性的鱷魚，以多種形式融入不羈和幽默的設計，從巧妙的同色系刺繡、滿版印花、大膽拼接，到充滿趣味性的皮革配飾。











這一次LACOSTE的秀上款式，台灣終於可以買到，受到注目的超多小鱷魚拼貼成大鱷魚的Logo像機包、立體的鱷魚手拿包、針織百褶裙、鱷魚刺繡的針織衫等單品，都可以在ARITACTS內買到，還有一系列的小白鞋與運動鞋，時髦到編輯們都邊看新品邊結帳啦！
更新時間｜2019.11.06 07:31
text:
The crocodile jumped out of the Polo shirt. The LACOSTE show was finally bought.
06 Nov 2019, 07:24 by Li Shiwen
After LACOSTE took over as the first female creative director, Louise Trotter, she became the brand in the fashion industry. From her first season of 2019, she became a hot fashion week brand. LACOSTE's French headquarters also decided to This season, a limited number of limited stores or boutiques are being sold, and Taiwan is currently only available at ARITACTS.


This LACOSTE's 2019 autumn and winter new models and models are sold exclusively at ARITACTS. (provided by LACOSTE)

Louise Trotter's autumn and winter 2019 is decorated with warm orange and LACOSTE Vert 132 green, and is decorated with the neutral shades of the Tudor and the white tones of the tennis court. Through geometric and stitching design elements, simple and smooth lines create Out of the high-end custom fashion collision sports street elements.














Another representative feature of the Fall/Winter 2019 show collection is the Louise Trotter's LACOSTE crocodile logo designed by Robert George in 1927, boldly reinterpreted and flipped. She combines LACOSTE's iconic crocodile into a variety of forms that combine innocuous and humorous designs, from ingenious tonal embroidery, full-page prints, bold stitching, to fun leather accessories.











This time LACOSTE's show style, Taiwan can finally buy, attention to a lot of small crocodile collage into a large crocodile Logo camera bag, three-dimensional crocodile clutch, knitted pleated skirt, crocodile embroidery sweater, etc. Single items, all available in ARITACTS, as well as a series of small white shoes and sneakers, fashionable to the editors are watching the new side checkout!
Update time|2019.11.06 07:31
